data.content:
noun
US or Brit blank cheque , pl ~ checks
[count] a signed check that does not have the amount of money written on it yet
informal :complete control or freedom - often used in the phrase give/hand (someone) a blank check
The director had a lot of creative freedom on this project; the film's backers essentially handed him a blank check. [=let him direct the film exactly the way he wanted to]
